page.syntax: Count as N = OCCURS(C searchfor,C searchin)

argument.name: searchfor
argument.description: The character string to find and count.

page.description: Returns the number of times one string is found in another.
page.discussion: OCCURS() returns the number of times the Find_String is found in the Search_In_String. The Search_In_String cannot be a memo field.
page.example: occurs("i", STATE) -> 4, if STATE contains "Mississippi" occurs("at", "The cat in the hat") -> 2 occurs("ab", "ABCDabcd") -> 1 dim lst as C lst = alpha beta alpha gamma %str% ? occurs("alpha", lst) = 2
page.limitations: The Find_String argument is case sensitive.
